messages.subject: Wondering if there are any New Hampshire Unschoolers ????
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I live in Attleboro, Massachusetts and we are planning on moving to the lakes region in New Hampshire. Bridgwater is a very small town and
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

I live in Attleboro, Massachusetts and we are planning on moving to
the lakes region in New Hampshire. Bridgwater is a very small town and
everything is so far away compared to where we live now. I am sort of
nervous because we live in a city where there is so much near us and
so many wondefful families. So I thought I would just take a peek and
see if there are any fellow "like minded people" that I may be in that
area.

Sonya
Attleboro, Mass.

Please feel free to mail me if you out there - thanks
jcurtielectric@...
